item.title: ‘Long Story Short’ Stars on Doing a Jewish Family Comedy in 2025: “There’s Going to Be Vitriol”
item.description: Abbi Jacobson, Ben Feldman, Max Greenfield and Lisa Edelstein celebrated Raphael Bob-Waksberg’s new animated series, while also speaking about representing a Jewish family in this moment.
